name: Black Research Group
body:
### About us
We are based in the Department of Biochemistry at the University of Otago, in Dunedin, New Zealand.
Our research focuses on the development and use of computational tools for the analysis of data from 
genomics experiments.  Much of our work involves studies of human disease, but we are also involved 
in agricultural and horticultural research.

### Principal Investigator
* [Associate Professor Mik Black](http://mikblacklab.github.io/biochem.otago.ac.nz/our-people/academic-teaching-staff/mik-black/)

### Visiting Postdoctoral Fellow
* Hoang Tan Nguyen

### PhD students:
* [Murray Cadzow](https://github.com/murraycadzow)
* [Tom Kelly](https://github.com/TomKellyGenetics)
* Hannah Lumley

### MSc students
* [James Boocock](https://github.com/smilefreak)
* Tom Brew
* Fran Munro
* Anthony Shaw
* Riku Takei

### Honours students
* Lyco Wen
